page.title: 12Recreation in March
page.content: The{River Nene}provides facilitees for{fishermen,}for{Scouts canoeing and for the {Watermans Club. { Canal boats}travel through March to many parts of the country. { Narrow boats}moor at{March Marina}and {boatyard.}The boatyard covers an area of two acres. We visited the owner and he was just finishing a{replica of the first boat to sail around the world. This year a{ten foot wide hotel boat is being made at the boatyard for an {American Package Holiday firm. The flat Fenland is ideal for the {Veteran and Vintage Cycling Club.} Members dress up in Victorian style and ride the old bikes owned by{Mr {Colin Bedford.}He and his wife have been on television with their bikes.Mr Bedford looks magnificent on his huge {1875 penny farthing. }Sarah Westbrook.
